text: The Manila Bulletin is a broadsheet newspaper in the Philippines. It is the largest newspaper by circulation in the Philippines. It was founded in 1900 as a shipping journal and it is also the second-oldest Philippine newspaper, following The Manila Times. It was previously known as Manila Daily Bulletin and as the Bulletin Today. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1900 establishments Category:1900s establishments in the Philippines Category:National newspapers published in the Philippines
title: Manila Bulletin
